</#if> <#if zwbm_s??> and ZWBM_S=:zwbm_s </#if> <#if sort??&&order??> order by ${sort} ${order} <#else> order by synchronous_time_t desc </#if>

select * from AT_INT_SAP_MATERIALS a where a.mattyp_s='FERT'
<#if factory1??> and a.matgrp_s in (:factory1) </#if> <#if factory2??> and a.matgrp_s in (:factory2) </#if> <#if materialcode_s??> and a.MaterialCode_S like :materialcode_s </#if> <#if materialdesc_s??> and a.materialdesc_s like :materialdesc_s </#if>
<#if materialspec_s??> and a.materialspec_s like :materialspec_s </#if>
<#if pattern_s??> and a.pattern_s like :pattern_s </#if>
<#if cj_s??> and a.cj_s like :cj_s </#if>

select count(1) from AT_INT_SAP_MATERIALS a where a.mattyp_s='FERT' <#if factory1??> and a.matgrp_s in (:factory1) </#if> <#if factory2??> and a.matgrp_s in (:factory2) </#if> <#if materialcode_s??> and a.MaterialCode_S like :materialcode_s </#if> <#if materialdesc_s??> and a.materialdesc_s like :materialdesc_s </#if>
<#if materialspec_s??> and a.materialspec_s like :materialspec_s </#if>
<#if pattern_s??> and a.pattern_s like :pattern_s </#if>
<#if cj_s??> and a.cj_s like :cj_s </#if>
select S.materialcode_s, S.materialdesc_s, S.materialspec_s, S.pattern_s, S.cj_s, S.Mattyp_s from AT_INT_SAP_MATERIALS S where s.mattyp_s = 'FERT'
select * from AT_INT_SAP_MATERIALS t where 1 = 1 and MaterialCode_S = :materialCode and rownum=1

sql.comment: 获取动平衡翻转未配置的物料号

sqls.sql: select t.atr_key, t.MaterialDesc_S,t.materialcode_s from AT_INT_SAP_MATERIALS t where 1=1 AND t.mattyp_s ='FERT' AND t.Matgrp_s in (:factory)

sql.comment: 获取胎胚得物料编码信息

sqls.sql: select * from at_int_sap_materials t where t.mattyp_s = 'HALB' and t.matstatus_s is null and t.MatGrp_S =:MatGrp_S
select t.dictcode_s,t.erpcode_s,t.dictname_s from at_cm_bs_coredictionary t where t.dictcode_s like '308%' and t.erpcode_s like :erpcode_s_b or t.erpcode_s like :erpcode_s_q order by t.dictcode_s
select t.dictcode_s,t.erpcode_s,t.dictname_s from at_cm_bs_coredictionary t where t.dictcode_s like '308%' order by t.dictcode_s

sql.comment: 根据物料组(dictcode_s)获取存放规格(外部代码/ERPCODE)

sqls.sql: select t.erpcode_s from at_cm_bs_coredictionary t where t.dictcode_s =:dictcode_s

sql.comment: 根据存放规格(外部代码/ERPCODE)获取物料信息

sqls.sql: select * from at_int_sap_materials t where t.matgrp_s=:matgrp_s

sql.comment: 获取半部件用所有物料信息（编码等）

sqls.sql: select t.materialcode_s,t.materialdesc_s,t.oldmatcode_s, m.erpcode_s from at_int_sap_materials t,at_cm_bs_coredictionary m where t.matgrp_s=m.erpcode_s and m.dictcode_s like '308%' and (m.erpcode_s like :erpcode_s_q or m.erpcode_s like :erpcode_s_b)

sql.comment: 获取半部件用所有物料信息（编码等）

sqls.sql: select t.materialcode_s,t.materialdesc_s,t.oldmatcode_s, m.erpcode_s from at_int_sap_materials t,at_cm_bs_coredictionary m where t.matgrp_s=m.erpcode_s and m.dictcode_s like '308%' and (m.erpcode_s like :erpcode_s_q or m.erpcode_s like :erpcode_s_b)

sql.comment: 根据物料组获得物料编码

sqls.sql: select t.materialcode_s,t.materialdesc_s,t.materialname_s,t.materialspec_s, m.erpcode_s from at_int_sap_materials t,at_cm_bs_coredictionary m where t.matgrp_s=m.erpcode_s and m.dictcode_s like:dictcode_s and m.erpcode_s like:erpcode_s

sql.comment: 根据物料编码获得物料名称和生产版本

sqls.sql: select t.materialname_s,m.Production_Ver_s from at_int_sap_materials t,AT_INT_SAP_PRODUCTVERSION m where t.materialcode_s=:materialCode and m.material_code_s=:materialCode
select MaterialCode_S, MaterialDesc_S, MaterialSpec_S, MatTyp_S, MatGrp_S from at_int_sap_materials t where t.matgrp_s in ('300001', '300002') order by t.matgrp_s
